description:
Pack in your rope with this colourful rope bag. Made using upcycled remnant fabric, the Drone rope bag makes getting to the crag easier for you, and makes things a little easier for the planet too. The dual padded shoulder straps let you wear the pack on your back, or your front as you lug in other gear.

  • Made from remnant fabrics, so colours will vary
  • Padded shoulder straps make it easy to pack in your rope
  • Holds up to 80m of rope
  • Large tarp
  • 4 tie-in points for better rope management
  • Zippered outer pocket keeps keys, wallets, and other small must-haves safe
  • Dual compressions straps for quick closure and comfortable carry
name: Edelrid Drone Rope Bag
